name: Canaterra Property Pages
overview:
We are a real estate search service with listings from coast to coast. As the “go to site” to find Developers and Builders new projects, a first time home buyer will easily find their new home online.

Our Promise to Our Website Users: Canaterra provides an easy to use, convenient and powerful service for new home for sale & rent listings. Home seekers have more control in finding a new home that’s right!

Our Promise to Developers/Home Builder Clients: Canaterra provides a powerful, effective & affordable new home & resale listing service. Canaterra makes it easy for Builders to connect with new home buyers by providing them with easy to use search tools. Canaterra is not affiliated with any real estate broker or media company. You can trust Canaterra - no cross sales, commissions or re-selling of listings - we are in the business of ‘connecting’.

Canaterra Property Pagesâ„¢ not only provides an easy to use and powerful application for new home listings which in turn provides buyers with more control over their purchase process, but we also provide the most cost effective listing service for new homes, and makes it easy for you to connect with new home buyers by providing them with easy to use and powerful search tools. (Canaterra users use the tool more!)
